trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a problem occurs while processing a security token.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException"></xref> class using the specified error message.
A message that identifies the reason the exception occurred.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException"></xref> class using the specified XML serialization data and contextual data about the source and destination of the serialization stream.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains values that are used during serialization and deserialization.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException"></xref> that contains data about the source and destination of the serialization stream.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException"></xref> class using the specified error message and root cause of the error.
A message that identifies the reason the exception occurred.
A <xref:System.Exception> that represents the root cause of the exception.
